attributes.action: move the sea borders of Scotland back to where they were before a bill in 1999 was passed, allowing the main government to steal what is rightfully Scotlands oil.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This bill was previously passed in 1999 when Scotland didn't have enough government power over it's own sea borders. Shocking & deceitful move to push this through before we actually had the chance to protect what is rightfully ours as a nation. Please sign!

Search for this on google, click on second link & you will see what I'm talking about:
westminster has moved scotland's marine borders
